verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that came to <S%H4318>Micah<s%> the <S%H4183>Morashtite<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%>, <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>, and <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%>, <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which he <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, ye <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, all of <S%H7181>you<s%>: hearken, O <S%H776>earth<s%>, and all that <S%H4393>therein<s%> <S%H136>is<s%>: and let the Lord <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H136>you<s%>, the Lord from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

For <S%H3068><s%>, behold, Jehovah cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place<s%>, and will come <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be <S%H4549>melted<s%> under <S%H6010>him<s%>, and the valleys shall be <S%H1234>cleft<s%>, as <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are <S%H5064>poured<s%> down a steep <S%H4174>place<s%>.

For the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is all <S%H2403>this<s%>, and for the sins of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. What is the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>? is it not <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>? and what are the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? are they not <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>?

Therefore I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> as a <S%H5856>heap<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and as places for planting <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>; and I will pour <S%H5064>down<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> thereof into the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, and I will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the foundations <S%H3247>thereof<s%>.

And all her graven <S%H6456>images<s%> shall be beaten to <S%H3807>pieces<s%>, and all her <S%H868>hires<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and all her <S%H6091>idols<s%> will I <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>; for of the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> hath she <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H868>them<s%>, and unto the hire of a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> shall they <S%H7725>return<s%>.

For this will I <S%H5594>lament<s%> and <S%H5594>wail<s%>; I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7758>stripped<s%> and <S%H6174>naked<s%>; I will <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4553>wailing<s%> like the <S%H8577>jackals<s%>, and a <S%H60>lamentation<s%> like the <S%H1323>ostriches<s%>.

For her <S%H4347>wounds<s%> are <S%H605>incurable<s%>; for it is <S%H935>come<s%> even unto <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; it <S%H5060>reacheth<s%> unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, even to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
Tell <S%H5046><s%> it not in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, <S%H1058>weep<s%> not at <S%H1058>all<s%>: at <S%H1036>Beth-le<s%>-aphrah have I <S%H6428>rolled<s%> myself in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.

Pass <S%H5674>away<s%>, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H8208>Shaphir<s%>, in <S%H6181>nakedness<s%> and <S%H1322>shame<s%>: the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6630>Zaanan<s%> is not come <S%H3318>forth<s%>; the <S%H4553>wailing<s%> of <S%H1018>Beth-ezel<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> from you the stay <S%H5979>thereof<s%>.

For the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4796>Maroth<s%> waiteth <S%H2342>anxiously<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>, because <S%H7451>evil<s%> is come <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Bind <S%H7573><s%> the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to the swift <S%H7409>steed<s%>, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>: she was the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H2403>sin<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; for the <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were found in <S%H4672>thee<s%>.

Therefore shalt thou <S%H5414>give<s%> a parting <S%H7964>gift<s%> to <S%H4182>Moresheth-gath<s%>: the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib<s%> shall be a deceitful <S%H391>thing<s%> unto the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

I will yet <S%H935>bring<s%> unto <S%H3427>thee<s%>, O inhabitant of <S%H4762>Mareshah<s%>, <S%H3423>him<s%> that shall possess <S%H3519>thee<s%>: the glory of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> even unto <S%H5725>Adullam<s%>.

Make thee <S%H7139>bald<s%>, and cut <S%H1494>off<s%> thy hair for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H8588>delight<s%>: <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> thy <S%H7144>baldness<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>; for they are gone into captivity from <S%H1540>thee<s%>.
